SIGN_IN.TITLE: Order your own delicious and healthy meal today!
SIGN_IN.OTP_MESSAGE: We'll be sending you an OTP for verification.

PHONE_VERIFICATION.TITLE: OTP Verification
PHONE_VERIFICATION.OTP_PROMPT: Enter the 6-digit OTP code sent to your registered phone number. The OTP code is only valid for 2 minutes.
PHONE_VERIFICATION.INCORRECT_ATTEMPTS_LIMIT_REACHED: You've entered incorrectly 5 times. Please try again after 30 minutes.
PHONE_VERIFICATION.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS:
The customer has exceeded the allowed number of attempts.

Please wait {time} to continue.

ADDITIONAL.TITLE: TELL US MORE ABOUT YOURSELF
ADDITIONAL.DESCRIPTION: The information you provide will help us recommend food that is better suited to your body type and needs.

ALLERGIC_FOOD.LABEL: Allergic Food (if any)
ALLERGIC_FOOD.NOTE: Please share more about the foods you are allergic to. Examples: animal milk, eggs, seafood (fish, shrimp, crab...), aquatic products (fish, shrimp, eel...), nuts (soybeans, walnuts, almonds...)

CHRONIC_DISEASE.LABEL: Chronic Diseases (if any)
CHRONIC_DISEASE.NOTE: Heart Disease, Cancer, Chronic Lung Disease, Stroke, Alzheimer's, Diabetes, Chronic Kidney Disease ...

BANNER.DESCRIPTION: A delicious and nutritious meal, prepared to your liking. No need to worry, no need to cook, flexible delivery time.
BANNER.SEARCH: Enter your address to find delicious food

TODAY.TITLE: The food we are proud of

ORDER_STEP.TITLE: How it work
ORDER_STEP.DESCRIPTION_1: Find delicious food near you or browse recommendations from 2ALL
ORDER_STEP.DESCRIPTION_2: Choose and customize dishes to your taste or dietary needs
ORDER_STEP.DESCRIPTION_3: Order flexibly and get your food delivered at your preferred time.
ORDER_STEP.DESCRIPTION_4: Savor delectable, nutritious meals customized to your personal preferences.

WHY_CHOOSE.TITLE: Why 2All
WHY_CHOOSE.DESCRIPTION_1: Select food and dishes tailored to your nutritional requirements, taste preferences, and physical condition.
WHY_CHOOSE.DESCRIPTION_2: Each dish's nutritional information includes its calorie, protein, fat, and carbohydrate content.
WHY_CHOOSE.DESCRIPTION_3: Place an order with a flexible delivery window that fits your schedule.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact us today to become a 2ALL partner
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: We're looking for partners across Vietnam to help us provide millions of delicious and healthy meals to Vietnamese customers.
CONTACT.MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Example: Hello 2ALL, I am interested in cooperating with you.

DOWNLOAD_APP.TITLE: Download the 2ALL app
DOWNLOAD_APP.DESCRIPTION: The experience of searching for delicious food at 2ALL is better on the mobile app. Now available on both iOS and Android platforms.
